title: Slasher film
summary: A slasher film is a genre of horror films involving a killer stalking and murdering a group of people, usually by use of bladed tools.[1] Although the term "slasher" may occasionally be used informally as a generic term for any horror film involving murder, film analysts cite an established set of characteristics which set slasher films apart from other horror subgenres, such as splatter films and psychological horror films.[2]
